## RepeatDirective.(constructor)

Creates an instance of RepeatDirective.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(dataBinding: Binding<TSource>, templateBinding: Binding<TSource, SyntheticViewTemplate>, options: RepeatOptions);
```

</td><td>

</td><td>
